meanings.definition: A short, pithy expression that conveys a general truth or piece of advice.
meanings.sent1: Grandma always shares her favorite sayings with us.
meanings.sent2: The saying 'early bird catches the worm' is popular.
meanings.sent3: The parrot learned a new saying and kept repeating it all day.
meanings.sent4: His saying about patience being a virtue stuck with me.
meanings.sent5: The saying 'actions speak louder than words' is so true.

meanings.definition: The act of uttering words or phrases.
meanings.sent1: His saying of the pledge was clear and confident.
meanings.sent2: The saying of vows at a wedding is emotional.
meanings.sent3: The saying of the magic words made the door open.
meanings.sent4: Her saying of the secret code allowed us to enter.
meanings.sent5: The saying of 'I love you' can mean so much.
